text:
Question 137) A waiter needs to choose a rectangular base tray to serve four sparkling glasses that need to be arranged in a single thread, parallel to the larger side of the tray, and with its bases fully supported on the tray. The base and upper edge of the cups are 4 cm and 5 cm radius circles, respectively. The tray to be chosen should have a minimum area, in square centimeter, equal to
A) 192.
B) 300.
C) 304.
D) 320.
E) 400.
